Ahoy Hoy

Hi! I am Tushar Sharma. Welcome to my digital footprint. This is my nest where I incubate my thoughts that I hope would someday hatch into something meaningful.

I recently pursued Senior Certificate programme from University of Florida. I've pursued my undergraduation in Electronics & Communication from JUIT.

I am a avid blogger and voracious reader. I love to code, occasionally dip my pen into poetry, enjoy dance and also harbour interest in literature. I spend my time solving interesting problems and compiling quotes of interesting people around the globe.
